data.text: @1A_GenXer @Juliedonuts @SenMarkey Now you sounds like the movie with will smith?  🤣🤣🤣
@SenMarkey No where in the constitution does it say we have to pay taxes either!
@SenMarkey Sorry, but I don't believe for one second that our elections have been fair in any way, shape, or form!
@SenMarkey American's want you scumbag criminals out of office.
@SenMarkey What planet are you on? We haven't had fair elections in decades! There is ONLY ONE reason to oppose the SAVE ACT & that's so the constant cheating & fraud continues.
@HappyApathetic @SenMarkey @lightfootno1 Every state already limits voting to citizens.
